name: Katara
description: Waterbending master from Southern Water Tribe, sister of Sokka, and friend of Aang.

name: Sokka
description: Water Tribe warrior of the Southern Water Tribe.

name: Yue
description: Princess of the Northern Water Tribe.

name: Hakoda
description: Father of Sokka and Katara, leading the Invasion of the Fire Nation.

name: Huu
description: Waterbending master from Foggy Swamp Tribe.

name: Hama
description: Developer of bloodbending.

name: Pakku
description: Aang's teacher for waterbending at Northern Water Tribe.

name: Arnook
description: Chief of the Northern Water Tribe.

name: Kuruk
description: Water Tribe Avatar, predecessor of Avatar Kyoshi.

name: Bato
description: Friend of Hakoda since childhood.

name: Due
description: Waterbending master from Foggy Swamp Tribe.

name: Hahn
description: Career-minded soldier from Northern Water Tribe.

name: Aang
description: Avatar Roku's successor. Also\nlearned how to energybend.

name: Appa
description: Aang's loyal sky bison friend.

name: Momo
description: Aang's loyal winged lemur\nfriend.

name: Gyatso
description: Aang's guardian, mentor,\nand father figure.

name: Teo
description:
Paraplegic Earth Kingdom
boy who lived in the Northern
Air Temple with his father,
the mechanist.

name: Yangchen
description: Air Nomad Avatar before\nAang, predecessor of Kuruk.

name: Afiko
description:
Airbender of Southern Air
Temple that revealed the
location of his home to the Fire
Nation.

name: Iio
description: Air Nomad nun and the Mother\nSuperior of the Eastern Air Temple.

name: Pathik
description: A nomadic supercentenarian\nwho possessed great knowledge\nof the Spirit World.

name: Tashi
description: One of five monks in charge\nof the Southern Air Temple.

name: Wan
description: The first Avatar.

name: Mechanist
description:
An inventor and engineer from
the Earth Kingdom who became
a refugee after being displaced
by a flood.

name: Zuko
description: Prince of the Fire Nation,\nFire Lord after Ozai.

name: Azula
description: Princess of the Fire Nation,\ndaughter of Fire Lord Ozai.

name: Ozai
description: Fire Lord during the final years\nof the Hundred Year War.

name: Ty Lee
description: Skilled acrobatic, mastering chi\nblocking martial arts.

name: Combustion Man
description: Firebending assassin and silent\nbounty hunter that was hired\nby Zuko to eliminate Aang.

name: Chit Sang
description: Inmate at the Boiling Rock\nprison in the Fire Nation.

name: Iroh
description: Retired Fire Nation General and\nwise mentor to his nephew Zuko.

name: Zhao
description: Leader of the Fire Nation Navy\nthat is obsessed to capture Aang.

name: Mai
description: Main ally of Princess Azula,\nproficient at throwing stilettos.

name: Roku
description: Avatar from Fire Nation,\npredecessor of Aang.

name: Sozin
description: Instigator of the Hundred\nYear War.

name: Great Sage
description: Leader of 5 Fire Sages who\nresided on Crescent Island.

name: Bumi
description: King of Omashu, childhood friend of Aang.

name: Cabbage Merchant
description: Earth Kingdom businessman and founder of Cabbage Corb.

name: The Boulder
description: Professional earthbending westler who participated in the Earth Rumble tournaments.

name: Haru
description: Skilled teenager earthbender that hides his skill because of Fire Nation attack.

name: Jet
description: Teenage leader of Earth Kingdom refugees that called themselves Freedom Fighters.

name: Jin Wei
description: Legendary patriarch of the Gan Jin tribe.

name: Kyoshi
description: Earth Kingdom Avatar, predecessor of Avatar Roku

name: Toph
description: Earthbending master that discover metalbending.

name: Long Feng
description: Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se and the leader of the Dai Li.

name: June
description: Bounty hunter with a shirshu as her pet.

name: Suki
description: Leader of Kyoshi Warrior.

name: Pipsqueak
description: Strongest member of Freedom Fighters.

name: Aang
description: One of a select few Avatars, and one of the first in many cycles to learn the ancient art of energybending.

name: Korra
description: The current incarnation of the Avatar and immediate successor of Avatar Aang.
